ygData.subject: Re: Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve toyed with the idea of dueling some of the kill stealing/spawn hogging bastards I ve run into in the game for the express purpose of putting them to
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 10 Jun 1999, Karen wrote:

> actually attack) Sleep I am told by friends who let me
> guinea pig them, says it works like a quick stun, they
> can't do anything for a second. I have not really been
> pked but have heard from people that bards are one of the
> hardest to kill, we have selo's of course which breaks
> root, and also Screech sends them running like mad in the
> other direction < g > I am sure there are other tips that

I've toyed with the idea of dueling some of the kill
stealing/spawn hogging bastards I've run into in the game for
the express purpose of putting them to sleep for 10-15 minutes
so someone else can get a shot at the mobs. :-) Guess that
won't work if it only works like a quick stun against players.

How well does the pixie chase work against players?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
